TEXT.TITLE: HARVARD INDUSTRIES <HAVA> ANNOUNCES STOCK SPLIT
TEXT.BODY: Harvard Industries Inc said its board approved a two-for-one stock split in the form of a special stock dividend of its outstanding common stock. The special dividend is payable May 28, 1987, to stockholders of record April 24, 1987. The split will be effected by one additional share for each common share held, the company said. Reuter
